body:
Hello everyone :D

I know that its a Discussion now but I feel that if old mini games that where taken down during Avicus where brought back. The name should revert back to MCZONE.

Discussion #1
http://avicus.net/forums/c4541bef8

Let me know what you guys think :)

title: Change name to McZone (Unofficial Discussion)

replies.body: ^ Some minigames from MCZone were great
replies.body_tagged: ^ Some minigames from MCZone were great

replies.body: The name sounds better and is easier to remember.
replies.body_tagged: The name sounds better and is easier to remember.

replies.body: We can't just change our name back to MC Zone, its like a company changing their name. Its difficult and expensive.
replies.body_tagged: We can't just change our name back to MC Zone, its like a company changing their name. Its difficult and expensive.

replies.body: don't change the name if its difficult just add some of the minigames from mczone
replies.body_tagged: don't change the name if its difficult just add some of the minigames from mczone

replies.body:
Just a question... If we were to donate only for the cost of the name change, will the name be changed?

I don't mean donate to get perks, what I mean is lets say I talk to ivy aka ''funky'' and I tell him i'm going to give you lets say 150 for the name change.

Again just a question.
replies.body_tagged:

Again just a question.
